TEXT.TITLE: MICHIGAN NATIONAL <MNCO> RAISES PRIME
TEXT.BODY: Michigan National Corp said it raised the prime rate for its subsidiary Michigan National Bank to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective yesterday. The move follows similar increases earlier in the week by other banks. Reuter
